subject: This question is for RJ
author: nightparanormalresearch
full_text:
Iam just wondering how long you have been doing I.T.C/E.V.P research 
and analasis Iam one of the 8 researchers Mike asked to help him in his 
project. The files he posted are his own. As for my files I am still 
working on them and after I send them to Mike and he is ok with me 
sharing them I have no problem posting them or sending them to you. I 
would be very interested in your opinion. On the other hand I have many 
files you may find interesting I am currently working on putting them 
up on esnips http://www.esnips.com/web/nightparanormalresearchsStuff
thats the link to a couple and theres more to come in the future. enjoy
back to my original question how long have you been involved with I.T.C 
and what is your favorite method of capturing I.T.C.

                      Thanx Mike W.
